caption.p: Effect of increasing concentration of Cs–Se NPs on total phenol ( A), total flavonoids ( B), vitamin C ( C), anthocyanin ( D), and antioxidant activity (DPPH) ( E) on bitter melon ( Momordica charantia) fruit under salinity stress. The SDs denoted by lower-case letters in the same treatment indicate significant differences at p < 0.05 by Tukey’s post hoc test.
